name: chatterboxadventure
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chatterbox adventure
des:
In this game you navigate the rooms and avoid the perils to survive until the end.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch chatterbox Adventure" or "Alexa, open chatterbox Adventure" to start a game".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop".
